entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:59 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:59 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow at times in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:59 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
